pageProps.content:
[["$r","MaxWidth","last",{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":["结构开发相对复杂，AntV Infographic 为",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/learn/design#structure","children":"结构"}],"准备了专用 AI 提示词，便于使用大模型（Claude、GPT-4 等）快速生成高质量代码。"]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"development-prompt","children":"开发提示词 "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["提示词位于 AntV Infographic ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://github.com/antvis/infographic","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"GitHub 仓库"}],"的中 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://github.com/antvis/Infographic/blob/main/src/designs/structures/prompt.md","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"src/designs/structures/prompt.md"}]," 文件中。其中包含以下内容："]}],"
",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"结构分类体系（列表、对比、顺序、层级、关系、地理、统计图）"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"技术规范（类型定义、可用组件、工具函数）"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"代码模板（简单结构、层级结构）"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"布局计算要点"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"按钮布局原则"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"命名规范"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"生成流程"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"示例代码"}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"usage","children":"使用方法 "}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"use-chat","children":"方法一：在 AI 对话中使用 "}],"
",["$r","ol",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","strong",null,{"children":"打开提示词文件"}],"："]}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-bash","children":"cat src/designs/structures/prompt.md
"}]}],"
",["$r","ol",null,{"start":"2","children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["
",["$r","p",null,{"children":[["$r","strong",null,{"children":"复制提示词内容"}],"到 AI 对话框（如 Claude、ChatGPT）"]}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["
",["$r","p",null,{"children":[["$r","strong",null,{"children":"描述你的需求"}],"，例如："]}],"
"]}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"我想开发一个循环流程结构，数据项围成一个圆形排列，相邻项之间有箭头连接，形成闭环。每个数据项可以添加、删除。
"}]}],"
",["$r","ol",null,{"start":"4","children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["
",["$r","p",null,{"children":[["$r","strong",null,{"children":"AI 生成代码"}],"，包括："]}],"
",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"完整的 TypeScript 类型定义"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"JSX 组件实现"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"注册语句"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"所有必需的导入"}],"
"]}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["
",["$r","p",null,{"children":[["$r","strong",null,{"children":"复制代码"}],"到项目中："]}],"
"]}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-bash","children":"src/designs/structures/MyStructure.tsx
"}]}],"
",["$r","ol",null,{"start":"6","children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","strong",null,{"children":"添加到导出"}],"："]}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["在 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"src/designs/structures/index.ts"}]," 中导出开发的结构。"]}],"
",["$r","ol",null,{"start":"7","children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["$r","strong",null,{"children":"在 Dev 环境测试"}]}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"use-cli-ai","children":"方法二：使用 Claude Code 或者 Codex（推荐） "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"如果你使用 Claude Code 或类似的 AI 编程助手："}],"
",["$r","ol",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","strong",null,{"children":"直接引用提示词文件"}],"："]}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-bash","children":"请阅读 src/designs/structures/prompt.md，
然后帮我开发一个循环流程结构。
"}]}],"
",["$r","ol",null,{"start":"2","children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["$r","strong",null,{"children":"AI 自动读取提示词并生成代码"}]}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["$r","strong",null,{"children":"AI 可以直接创建文件并添加到导出"}]}],"
"]}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"无论采用哪种方式，提交前都请在 Dev 环境验证布局与交互是否符合预期。"}]]}]]

[["$r","MaxWidth","last",{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":["Structure development is relatively complex. AntV Infographic has prepared a dedicated AI prompt for ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/learn/design#structure","children":"structures"}],", making it easy to quickly generate high-quality code using large language models (Claude, GPT-4, etc.)."]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"development-prompt","children":"Development Prompt "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["The prompt is located in the ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://github.com/antvis/Infographic/blob/main/src/designs/structures/prompt.md","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"src/designs/structures/prompt.md"}]," file in the AntV Infographic ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://github.com/antvis/infographic","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"GitHub repository"}],". It contains the following:"]}],"
",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"Structure classification system (list, comparison, sequence, hierarchy, relationship, geographic, statistical charts)"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"Technical specifications (type definitions, available components, utility functions)"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"Code templates (simple structure, hierarchical structure)"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"Layout calculation essentials"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"Button layout principles"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"Naming conventions"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"Generation process"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"Example code"}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"usage","children":"Usage "}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"use-chat","children":"Method 1: Use in AI Conversations "}],"
",["$r","ol",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","strong",null,{"children":"Open the prompt file"}],":"]}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-bash","children":"cat src/designs/structures/prompt.md
"}]}],"
",["$r","ol",null,{"start":"2","children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["
",["$r","p",null,{"children":[["$r","strong",null,{"children":"Copy the prompt content"}]," to an AI chatbox (e.g., Claude, ChatGPT)"]}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["
",["$r","p",null,{"children":[["$r","strong",null,{"children":"Describe your requirements"}],", for example:"]}],"
"]}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"I want to develop a circular flow structure where data items are arranged in a circle with arrows connecting adjacent items to form a closed loop. Each data item can be added or deleted.
"}]}],"
",["$r","ol",null,{"start":"4","children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["
",["$r","p",null,{"children":[["$r","strong",null,{"children":"AI generates code"}],", including:"]}],"
",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"Complete TypeScript type definitions"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"JSX component implementation"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"Registration statements"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"All required imports"}],"
"]}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["
",["$r","p",null,{"children":[["$r","strong",null,{"children":"Copy the code"}]," to your project:"]}],"
"]}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-bash","children":"src/designs/structures/MyStructure.tsx
"}]}],"
",["$r","ol",null,{"start":"6","children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","strong",null,{"children":"Add to exports"}],":"]}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["Export the developed structure in ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"src/designs/structures/index.ts"}],"."]}],"
",["$r","ol",null,{"start":"7","children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["$r","strong",null,{"children":"Test in Dev environment"}]}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"use-cli-ai","children":"Method 2: Use Claude Code or Codex (Recommended) "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"If you use Claude Code or similar AI programming assistants:"}],"
",["$r","ol",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","strong",null,{"children":"Directly reference the prompt file"}],":"]}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-bash","children":"Please read src/designs/structures/prompt.md,
then help me develop a circular flow structure.
"}]}],"
",["$r","ol",null,{"start":"2","children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["$r","strong",null,{"children":"AI automatically reads the prompt and generates code"}]}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["$r","strong",null,{"children":"AI can directly create files and add to exports"}]}],"
"]}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"Regardless of which method you use, please verify that the layout and interactions meet expectations in the Dev environment before submitting."}]]}]]
